flawed_nl_solution:
Silas paid half = 150/2 = <<150/2=75>>75
Remaining bill paid by 5 friends = 75 + 10% of 150 = 75 + 15 = 85
Each person will pay 1/5 which is 85/5 = <<85/5=17>>17
Each friend will pay $17=<<17=17>>17.
#### 17

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 90, not 85. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
